text: Ulpius is the nomen of the Roman gens Ulpia. It may refer to: *Marcus Ulpius Traianus (senator) (30-100), Roman senator *Ulpia (grandmother of Hadrian), sister to senator Marcus Ulpius Traianus, mother of Publius Aelius Hadrianus Afer (1st century) and paternal grandmother to emperor Hadrian (76-138) *Ulpia Marciana, 48-114, sister of Emperor Trajan *Marcus Ulpius Traianus (53-117), better known as the emperor Trajan, son of Senator Marcus Ulpius Traianus *Ulpius Marcellus, 2nd-century Roman governor of Britannia *Ulpius Marcellus (son), possible Roman governor, son of Ulpius Marcellus *Ulpia Severina, Roman Empress of the 3rd century *Laelianus (fl. 268), Gallic Emperor, Ulpius Cornelius Laelianus
title: Ulpius
